general.name: Abdessalam Dakhissi
general.headline: Software Engineer
about: I'm Abdessalam, a software engineer based in Morocco. I'm passionate about building software that makes a difference.
I'm currently working at P2SLINK where i build and maintain entreprise software solutions.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Work on multiple entreprise software solutions varying from Network management system to CRM applications , I also work in Ai technolgoies and NLP projects.

experiences.title: Supervision B2B
experiences.description: Worked on the supervision of the B2B network of Inwi, I was responsible for the monitoring of the network and the resolution of incidents.

experiences.title: Freelancer Software Developer
experiences.description: Developed a full stack web application for a client in France

experiences.title: Freelancer Software Developer
experiences.description: Work as part of a team to develop a WMS solution for a major client in Africa

education.subject: Licence
education.university: University of Moulay Ismail , FST Errachidia

projects.name: NMS (Network Management System)
projects.description: a SNMP based network management system that allows you to monitor your network devices and get alerts in case of failure.

projects.name: Medical AI
projects.description: A chatbot that allows you to get medical advice and book appointments with doctors.

projects.description: A simple and easy to use bug tracking system wiht integrated AI assistant.

projects.name: GeoMedical
